name: The Courtyard Baithak - An Evening of Ghazals
description: The Courtyard Baithak series is curated by tabla wizard and prodigy Trilochan Kampli, who with his uncompromising standards in music, evokes the best from every artist that he invites to perform. We are bringing musicians and audiences together on a sublime musical journey.Exclusive gatherings, quiet strains of exquisite music, and dedicated artists across selected genres - The Courtyard Baithak series promises a true classical musical experience.Please note: The ticket includes performance onlyAbout the artist- Kaamod SubhashKaamod Subhash is an accomplished artist, singer, music composer, and vocal coach with a rich musical heritage from Nagpur. Trained under his father, Shri R. Subhash, a renowned Marathi Ghazal singer, Kaamod holds a master’s degree in Hindustani Classical Vocal Music from the University of Mumbai.Kaamod has received prestigious accolades, including the Yuva Ratna Award for his contributions to India’s cultural development, proposed by the legendary Shri Jagjit Singh, and the ‘Versatile Star Artist Of The Year Award’ by the University of Mumbai in 2007.Influenced by ghazal legends like Mehdi Hasan, Ghulam Ali, Jagjit Singh, and Hariharan, Kaamod’s talent has been recognized and praised by maestros such as Ghulam Ali, Anup Jalota, Pankaj Udhas, Talat Aziz, and Ustad Rashid Khan.Kaamod Subhash brings his unique flavor to every performance, promising an enchanting evening of ghazals at our event.Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Children aged 5 and older require a ticket.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

name: Brushes & Besties!
description: Join us on August 4th (Friendship Day!) for an epic paint party! Create unforgettable memories with your besties through creativity and fun. Whether you’re coming with a group of friends or flying solo, everyone is welcome to join the fun!Event Highlights:Date: August 4thTime: 4 to 6pmLocation: Board in the City, KoramangalaWhat’s in Store:Collaborative Tote Bag Painting: Each friend’s design will fit together like a puzzle to form one big masterpiece!Swap Party Madness: Every 5 minutes, swap your tote bag with a friend and continue painting. Add your unique touch to each other’s bags.Take Home a Keepsake: End the event with a beautifully painted tote bag filled with your friends’ creativity.Tickets: Rs 899 (includes a Rs 299 redeemable food/beverage voucher)Don't miss out on this fun and creative celebration of friendship. Grab your friends or come solo and join us for a day of painting, laughter and unforgettable memories!

location.address: 7th Cross Rd, KHB Colony, 7th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Pop Up Paint Party by Manisha
organizer.description: Whether you’re celebrating a birthday or a baby-shower, planning a girl’s night out or a corporate event, we’ll work with you to create a bespoke experience that meets your needs. Unleash your inner Picasso while having a blast!

name: Plats around the world by Plats, Delhi | Conservatory, Bangalore
description: Plats Around the World: Delhi's Finest by Chefs Hanisha and JamsheedPlats brings the world to your plate with its unique culinary spin. Chefs and Patrons Hanisha and Jamsheed present a contemporary dining experience showcasing honest plates of food that transcend specific cuisines. Their dishes are technique-driven, using the finest seasonal produce and globally inspired flavors. The result is food that is refined yet comforting, familiar yet creative.The menu is an amalgamation of dishes inspired by the chefs' travels and cherished meals with family and friends. With a focus on flavor-forward dishes, no-fuss plating, and hearty portions, Plats embodies what Hanisha and Jamsheed love to eat, cook, and share.SET MENUPLEASE NOTE:The vegetarian menu includes dishes that contain eggs. We can provide eggless alternatives upon prior request.If you have a seafood allergy, we can replace seafood courses on the non-vegetarian menu with vegetarian option.Please mention your preferences while booking your spot.Vegetarian Tasting MenuCourse 1Crisp potato pave, smoked carrot lox tartare, dill cream cheese, capers, pickled shallots Course 2Charred young broccoli, sambal romesco, burnt lime and peanut crumble Course 3Char grilled exotic mushrooms, yellow chilli and feta huancaina, smoked bandel cheese, pickled chillies and picante salsaCourse 4Pan fried gnocchi, smoked eggplant kashq, charred tomatoes, pistachio, pomegranate molasses, fetaCourse 5Roasted butternut squash mille feuille, sauce verdure, sweet potato crumb, chevre, pickles Course 6Vanilla and Coconut tres leches, passionfruit curd, ginger lime crumb Course 7Slow baked dark chocolate apricot cake with spiced namelaka and cocoa nib and almond tuilleNon-Vegetarian Tasting MenuCourse 1Prawn and calamari plancha, zesty passionfruit tigre de leches, celery herb salad, prawn oilCourse 2Korean fried shrimp stuffed chicken wing, gochuchang caramel, kimchi, sesame and scallionCourse 3Smoked pork and chorizo dumpling, spiced chorizo and tomato broth, bacon crumble and pickled green appleCourse 4Chicken steak presse, stuffed morrels, roast garlic and miso emulsion, chicken jus Course 5Braised and pulled lamb crumbed steak, caramelized onion and mint, spiced lamb jus, mashed potatoesCourse 6Vanilla and Coconut tres leches, passionfruit curd, ginger lime crumb Course 7Slow baked brandy dark chocolate and apricot cake with spiced namelaka and cocoa nib and almond tuilleTerms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 7 and above require a ticket to attend the meal. If you are bringing a child under 7, please inform us in advance, as we do not have a baby seat at the venue.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: Private Guided Tour of the Automotive Wonders of the World!
description: For a limited group of individuals, we will open out a treasure trove hidden in Bangalore! You will get to experience the restoration, preservation & collection of Historic Cars, Motorcycles, Carriages and all things automotive passionately built over the past 40 years!

organizer.name: Classic Chase
organizer.description: Immerse yourself in an era gone by...

name: day retreat - Animal flow & brunch
description: Come join us for a day filled with fun , relaxation and good food. It’s an all day retreat which entails a combination of activities and food breaks. The whole event is tailored keeping in mind , nourishment for the body and mind so take a break and indulge in some mindful activities. The day should look like 930 am - Arrival Upon arrival indulge in some healthy nourishing breakfast.10am  Warm up with some fun game and activities 11am - 12pm Functional training to prepare for the events to follow and end with a session of tug of war12pm to 1 pm Indulge in some lip smacking food laid out as a communal lunch by Master chef Arthi , whose has a speciality pop up restaurant Ragù1pm - 2pm You have some free time , use this time for conversations , a stroll in the farm or read a book 2pm - 4pm We will have a session of animal flow taught by Ranjit from ,Academy of strength , followed by mobility and flexibility session.4pm to 5pm Indulge in snacks and some fun games to end the session

organizer.name: KSARAAH
organizer.description: we are an organic farm hosting a variety of activities over the weekend

name: Where Strangers become Beer Buddies
description: Looking to meet new people and have a great time? Come join us for a fun and casual Beer Buddies! This is the perfect opportunity to connect with fellow beer enthusiasts, share your favorite brews, and make new friends in a relaxed atmosphere. Whether you're a craft beer expert or just love a good pint, everyone is welcome.What to expect?Friendly conversationsA variety of beers to tryFun ice breakers

location.address: No. 67/1, Brigade Solitare, Residency Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025, India

organizer.name: TwoTablesClub
organizer.description: Where a small group of strangers come together for genuine conversations & spontaneous connections  over a curated meal. Guided by a host every Table is a mix of locals & newcomers sharing stories of their roots & dreams

name: Hangover Breakfast with Strangers
description: Had a wild night and need a good recovery breakfast? Join us for a fun and delicious hangover breakfast table.Come as you are, and let's enjoy some hearty breakfast dishes, strong coffee, and good company. It's the perfect way to share last night's stories, laugh off the hangover, and start the day with new friends.Feel free to bring anyone who could use a good breakfast and a few laughs. See you there!

location.address: Maratt Estate, Bannerghatta Rd, opposite Shell Petrol Pump, Dollar Layout, Phase 4, J. P. Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560076, India

name: 'Matilda the Musical' (2022) Movie Screening | Family Movie Night
description: Family Movie Night at The Studio, Courtyard, ShantinagarJoin us as we watch a series of carefully curated rare masterpieces from around the world, made just for kids. Watch this film while cozying up with your family!Given the nature of the film, we recommend it for children aged 7 and older.About the movie:Matilda the Musical (2022) is a film adaptation of the Tony Award-winning stage musical based on Roald Dahl's beloved children's novel. The story centers around Matilda Wormwood, an exceptionally intelligent and imaginative young girl who feels like an outsider in her own family and school. Her parents, the Wormwoods, are neglectful and dismissive, while her school headmistress, Miss Trunchbull, is a tyrant who terrorizes the students.Why Attend?Broaden Horizons with Global Tales: Dive into diverse artistic expressions through rare masterpieces curated for children.Quality Family Bonding: Embark on a cinematic journey to a new country each month, forging lasting memories and strengthening family connections.Uncover Hidden Treasures: Discover lesser-known gems handpicked for their artistic brilliance and captivating storytelling.Artistic Excellence: Immerse your child in films of unparalleled artistic merit, fueling their imagination and creativity.Safe Family Environment: Enjoy movies in a secure, family-friendly setting, ensuring a worry-free experience for kids and parents alike.Don't miss this opportunity to create lasting memories with your family while exposing your kids to the wonders of world cinema.Join us for Family Movie Night – where the magic of storytelling knows no bounds!Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.The Event is taking place at Courtyard's indoor Studio space. No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain or other unforeseen conditions, the event will be moved indoors.

name: Screening: Jojo Rabbit (2019) | Movie Under the Stars
description: Join us for an open-air screening of ”Jojo Rabbit” (2019), with a three-course dinner and popcorn. *Wines will be available for purchase at the venue.About the movieJojo Rabbit (2019) is a satirical film directed by Taika Waititi. Set in Nazi Germany during World War II, the story follows Johannes "Jojo" Betzler, a 10-year-old boy who is an enthusiastic member of the Hitler Youth. Jojo idolizes Adolf Hitler, who appears to him in the form of an imaginary friend played by Waititi himself.3-Course Menu Coming SoonTerms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

name: Warrior Rhythm Brunch with Usha
description: Come join us and explore a 70 minute Warrior Rhythm workshop with Usha Rao.WARRIOR Rhythm™ is a fusion of rebel yoga flows + strength training + HIIT + mindfulness rolled into one insanely rhythmic experience! Fitness-focused with yoga undertones, it increases overall strength, flexibility, and balance.Followed by a warrior brunch, including an energizing ginger shot, protein breakfast bowls and tropical protein packed smoothie bowls in our natural, serene setting at The Studio by Copper + Cloves will be the perfect start to your weekend!
